attributes.action: Charge a visa entry fee to all countries that charge the UK resident
attributes.background:
A large amount of countries charge for entry 
The UK should do the same

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. In particular, we're not sure what you mean by a "visa entry fee". Applications for UK visas already have fees. You can find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/visa-fees

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
